_comment: Example profile for a Data Engineer applying in Melbourne, Australia
_instructions: Copy this file, rename it (e.g. my_profile.json), and fill in YOUR details below
sponsorship_answer_text: No, I do not require visa sponsorship. I am a Permanent Resident with full work rights.
work_auth_answer_text: Yes, I am legally authorized to work with unrestricted work rights.
cover_letter_text: I have 5+ years of experience in data engineering with expertise in Python, SQL, Spark, Airflow, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure). I do not require sponsorship and am keen to contribute to your team.
default_answer_text: I have 5+ years of experience in data engineering with expertise in Python, SQL, Spark, Airflow, and cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure). I am enthusiastic about this opportunity.
